overview: Derek Netelenbos serves as Senior Vice President of Sales and Service leading the company’s ad sales, distribution partnership initiatives and customer service department. Prior to joining PeopleFinders, Derek spent 6 years at WhitePages.com as Vice President of Advertising Sales and Operations and prior to that as Vice President of Business Development. In both roles he was instrumental in helping the company achieve its impressive growth. Prior to WhitePages.com, Derek held senior marketing and product management positions with Loudeye Technologies. Derek was also a top performing national account executive for AT&T and a consultant for Ernst & Young. He holds a BA in Business Administration from the University of Washington with concentrations in Finance and Marketing.

relationships.title: Vice President, Online Advertising Sales and Operations
